Undertaken Internships

My Work Experience garnered through Internships

Sept'19 -target="_blank">Natural Language Processing Research Intern

Aug'19 - Analysed - Virtual Recruitment Platform

As a machine learning intern @ Analysed.in which is one of the Top 10 companies for providing HR Analytics Solution Providers in 2019. Here I have completed projects related to web and data analytics. Along with this, I have built models for comparing different resumes and also for predicting different results through usage of data.

May'19 - Indian Institute of Science, Bengaluru

Being an intern at Indian Institute of Science was an experience which I would cherish all my life. I was assigned a project in the NanoScience Department. The project had implementation of computer vision technique. I was also introduced to complex equipments and techniques used to carry out experiments. All in all it was a "DREAM COME TRUE FOR ME".

Oct'18 - Stepup Analytics

Stepup Analytics is a Data Science/Machine Learning community which has given ML enthusiasts a way to learn about different topics related to Data Science and Machine Learning. I am currently a Research Intern for Stepup Analytics where I research about spectrum of domains of Machine Learning. It involves research about the topics, implementing practical implementations of the same and the creating a article for the enthusiasts.

Oct'18 - Chegg

At Chegg, I have been a subject matter expert for computer Science subject. Here my job is to answer queries and provide apt solutions to students who are looking for tricks and tips for solving computer Science related questions.

Aug'18 - Internshala

Through this internship, I got deeper insights about how products and services are promoted. Being a Internshala Student Partner, I was required to make students and aspirants aware of Internshala and services it offers. It was a unique experience altogether.

Jun'18 - Madhya Pradesh State Cyber Cell

Being a technical intern at M.P. State Cyber Cell gave me the opportunity to learn about the tactics and tools used by Cyber Police to catch criminals. Along with this, various softwares were built for them which helped in expediting the mundane tasks and decrease the efforts involved in doing the same.

Apr'18 - Unacademy (E-learning Platform)

Unacademy is India's one of the biggest E-learning platform. I had the privelege of getting selected as an Educator in Computer Science field. Till today, I have uploaded more than 100 video lessons which has received good amount of praise from the students as they my 7 courses have accured 12,000+ views. The courses consists of subjects like Data Mining and Warehousing, DBMS, Cryptography and Cyber Security, Communication skills and many more.

Mar'18 - Arsedevils

Arsedevils is a platform where football fans get to know about their clubs especially, Manchester United and Arsenal. I was a content writer at this platform. I had contributed articles on various topics like player's transfer speculations, performance of players and also it comparison of players of different teams. This internship helped in understanding of how an article is written and what are various tasks taking place behind the curtains.

Jun'17 - Impetus Infotech Pvt. Ltd.

At Impetus, I was introduced to the intricacies of web development and related processess which are covered in the industry.The internship also introduced me to various kinds of techniques involved in developing dyanmic websites.
